dalserver
Class ParamSet

java.lang.Object
  dalserver.ParamSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SsapParamSet
public class ParamSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable

The ParamSet class implements a parameter set mechanism oriented toward service request parameters. A parameter set is an ordered set of parameters; a parameter has a name, type, value, and other metadata.

Method Summary

Method Detail

addParam

public void addParam(Param param)
Add a parameter to a ParamSet. The parameter set is ordered, with newly added parameters added at the end of the list.

Parameters:
param - An object of type Param.

getParam

public Param getParam(java.lang.String name)
Lookup a parameter by name.

setValue

public void setValue(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String newValue)
              throws DalServerException,
                     InvalidDateException
Set or update the value of a parameter (convenience method). Causes the value of the isSet attribute to be set to true if the new value is non-null, false otherwise. For finer control the methods of the Param class should be called directly.

Parameters:
newValue - The new parameter value, as a String.
Throws:
DalServerException
InvalidDateException

getValue

public java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String name)
                          throws DalServerException
Get the value of a parameter as a String (convenience method).

Parameters:
name - The parameter name.
Returns:
Returns the parameter value as a String, or null if no parameter value is set.
Throws:
DALServerException - If parameter is not found.
DalServerException

iterator
